ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] a few kaesora questions
ygData.msgSnippet: who got the bp s? ... From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@maxtor.com] Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 2:13 PM To: eqbards@egroups.com Subject: RE:
ygData.messageBody:
who got the bp's?

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 2:13 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] a few kaesora questions


Spectral Pestle is for the shammy Can II quest... (i.e. the pointless
useless quest).
On another note, Min, I am a slacker but if you still need that bp we can do
it this weekend...
We killed Trak again though last night tee hee - no bard bp yet (had to make
this related!) but got a cobalt and a druid :)
Going to try our luck on the DL dragon i think this weekend :)

Halana 54th Shammy Flirt
Tani 27th Bardette
Solusek Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 12:05 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] a few kaesora questions
>
>
> anyone know where the strathbone shell shield in kaesora
> drops, i have a
> couple friends that would love to get their hands on it, im
> assuming the
> spiders but dunno.
>
> Was in there last night trying to get the stupid fang, took
> us 2 hours to
> get to the rest of the gang down there waiting for him to
> spawn (they were
> down there 6 hours and got 3 fangs only) and we were there a
> couple hours
> and only 1 spawned.
>
> On the bright side, got some truesilver boots (AC11)from a
> ravener for my
> bard (he's only got steel booties on) and we all got a
> ransackers pack (25%
> weight reduction) from spectral guardians. We got lost big
> time in there,
> its a very cool layout for a dungeon and was fun running
> around lost in it,
> seems very big, we killed a librarian and got a tome (6int 6 wis) and
> basically ran around killing everything in sight.
>
> But anyways, thats not the main reason i writing this email, my main
> question is where do i go to get the coin (and whats it from) from the
> xolvarg or wahtever he's called and also, what the hell is a Spectral
> Pestle for from the spectral guardians.... they're no drop
> and alakazams has
> no info on it.
>
> One last question, anything else i should pick up while im there?
>
> -Minkin 37 bard
> -Rakka 52 necro <-- he's camping the place as its easier for
> him then the
> bard
>
> P.S. I love that cattana song, the bard i was with yesterday
> kept me and the
> wizard full mana and i was nuking like a maniac, especially
> that it stacks
> with lich form
>
>
